entities.name: Articque
entities.description: A company providing mapping and data visualization solutions, including CDO and Articque Platform.

entities.name: La Banque Postale
entities.description: A client of Articque, uses CDO to translate financial data of local authorities into maps.

entities.name: CDO
entities.description: Enables companies to publish spatial dashboards presenting financial ratios of municipalities.

entities.name: Spatial dashboard
entities.description: Interactive maps to make open data available, presenting financial ratios (taxes, personnel expenses).

entities.name: Seqens
entities.description: A merger of six Social companies for housing, one of the leading actors in social housing in Ile-de-France with 100k accommodations.

entities.name: Groupe Action Logement
entities.description: Parent group of Seqens.

entities.name: Articque Platform
entities.description: Permits providing public interactive maps of social housing stock; allows translation of Excel files for unemployment data; used internally for housing stock management and service optimization.

entities.name: Direction de l’Animation de la Recherche, des Etudes et des statistiques
entities.description: Linked to the Minister of Labor, in charge of communicating statistics on jobseekers.

entities.name: Observatory
entities.description: Enables the public to visualize unemployment data at different scales (local, departmental, regional).

entities.name: Financial data mapping for local authorities
entities.description: Translating financial data of local authorities and municipalities into maps.

entities.name: Open data availability for public and elected representatives
entities.description: Making open data available to all (public and elected representatives).

entities.name: Financial ratio presentation for municipalities
entities.description: Presenting financial ratios of municipalities (taxes, personnel expenses).

entities.name: Social housing stock value highlighting
entities.description: Highlighting the value of the housing stock in Ile-de-France.

entities.name: Public interactive mapping of social housing stock
entities.description: Providing a public interactive map of the social housing stock, focused on Ile-de-France, for house seekers.

entities.name: Housing stock management
entities.description: Improving housing stock management internally.

entities.name: Service optimization
entities.description: Optimizing services like caretakers’ distribution and occupancy rate.

entities.name: Jobseeker statistics communication
entities.description: Communicating statistics on jobseekers.

entities.name: Unemployment data mapping and communication
entities.description: Translating raw data into maps to communicate unemployment issues, revealing geographic trends.

entities.name: Public understanding of unemployment data
entities.description: Easing public understanding about unemployment data.

entities.name: Transparency in government communication
entities.description: Giving transparency to DARES’ communication.
A key metric for optimizing housing services.

entities.eventName: CDO Adoption by La Banque Postale
entities.description: La Banque Postale started using CDO to translate financial data of local authority into maps.
Seqens launched its new website.
Seqens decided to exploit Articque Platform to value the housing stock in Ile-de-France.
DARES adopted Articque Platform to communicate statistics and data.
